data.name: activity_addparagraph
data.value: パラグラフを追加

data.name: activity_addparagraph_filename
data.value: ファイル名

data.name: activity_addparagraph_filename_help
data.value: Full path and filename of Microsoft Word document to work with

data.name: activity_addparagraph_index
data.value: インデックス

data.name: activity_addparagraph_index_help
data.value: Add the new paragraph at this index (zero indexed) Leave blank to add at the end of the document

data.value: テキスト

data.name: activity_addparagraph_text_help
data.value: The text to add

data.name: activity_addparagraph_tooltip
data.value: Add a new Paragraph to a Microsoft Word document

data.name: activity_clearrange
data.value: 範囲をクリア

data.name: activity_clearrange_cells
data.value: セル

data.name: activity_clearrange_cells_help
data.value: Set what cells to clear, leave blank to clear all cells

data.name: activity_clearrange_tooltip
data.value: Clears all data and formating from a range of cells

data.name: activity_closedocument
data.value: ドキュメントをクローズ

data.name: activity_closedocument_filename
data.value: ファイル名

data.name: activity_closedocument_filename_help
data.value: Full path and filename of Microsoft Word document to work with

data.name: activity_closedocument_savechanges
data.value: 変更を保存

data.name: activity_closedocument_savechanges_help
data.value: Set to true, to save the word file, set to false to discard any changces made

data.name: activity_closedocument_tooltip
data.value: Close a Microsoft Word document if open, will also closes word if no more documents are open

data.name: activity_closeworkbook
data.value: ワークブックを閉じる

data.name: activity_closeworkbook_filename
data.value: ファイル名

data.name: activity_closeworkbook_filename_help
data.value: Full path and filename of Microsoft Excel workbook to work with

data.name: activity_closeworkbook_savechanges
data.value: 変更を保存

data.name: activity_closeworkbook_savechanges_help
data.value: Set to true, to save the excel file, set to false to discard any changces made

data.name: activity_closeworkbook_tooltip
data.value: Close a Workbook if open, will also closes excel if no more workbooks are open

data.name: activity_closeworkbook_workbook
data.value: ワークブック

data.name: activity_closeworkbook_workbook_help
data.value: Use a Microsoft Excel workbook variable to work with

data.name: activity_drop_hint
data.value: アクティビティをドロップ

data.name: activity_filename
data.value: ファイル名

data.value: 再読込

data.value: メールを取得

data.name: activity_getmails_filter
data.value: フィルター

data.name: activity_getmails_filter_hint
data.value: Filter emails by query

data.name: activity_getmails_tooltip
data.value: Get all emails from a Microsoft Outlook folder

data.name: activity_getparagraph
data.value: パラグラフを取得

data.name: activity_getparagraph_count
data.value: 件数

data.name: activity_getparagraph_count_help
data.value: Returns the number of paragraphs in the Microsoft Word document

data.name: activity_getparagraph_filename
data.value: ファイル名

data.name: activity_getparagraph_filename_help
data.value: Full path and filename of Microsoft Word document to work with

data.name: activity_getparagraph_index
data.value: インデックス

data.name: activity_getparagraph_index_help
data.value: Get all the content of the paragraph with this index and a MaxResults more. Leave this field blank to get the entire word document

data.name: activity_getparagraph_maxresults
data.value: 最大結果

data.name: activity_getparagraph_maxresults_help
data.value: Limit the amount of paragraphs to get, leave blank or at 0 to get all from Index and onward

data.name: activity_getparagraph_text
data.value: テキスト

data.name: activity_getparagraph_text_help
data.value: Save the read paragrahs to this variable

data.name: activity_getparagraph_tooltip
data.value: Get one or more paragraphs from a Microsoft Word document

data.name: activity_getselectedrange
data.value: 選択範囲を取得

data.name: activity_getselectedrange_tooltip
data.value: Get the currently selected cells in the specefied worksheet

data.name: activity_movemailitem
data.value: メールアイテムを移動

data.name: activity_movemailitem_tooltip
data.value: Move a mail gotten with GetEmails to a different folder

data.name: activity_movemail_mail
data.value: メール

data.name: activity_movemail_mail_hint
data.value: Mail item to move

data.name: activity_newmailitem
data.value: 新規メールアイテム

data.name: activity_newmailitem_tooltip
data.value: Create a new Microsoft Outlook Mailitem

data.name: activity_readcell
data.value: セルを読込

data.name: activity_readcell_tooltip
data.value: Read the content of a single cell in Microsoft Excel

data.name: activity_readrange
data.value: 範囲を読込

data.name: activity_readrange_clearformats
data.value: 書式をクリア

data.name: activity_readrange_clearformats_help
data.value: Set to true to remove all formatting from the select worksheet

data.name: activity_readrange_tooltip
data.value: Read a range from a Microsoft Excel sheet

data.name: activity_readrange_useheaderrow
data.value: ヘッダー行を使用

data.name: activity_readrange_useheaderrow_help
data.value: If select range also contains a header row with column names, set this to true, else leave blank ( then all cloumns will have no name )

data.name: activity_runexcelmacro
data.value: Excel マクロを実行

data.name: activity_runexcelmacro_name_hint
data.value: マクロ名

data.name: activity_runexcelmacro_tooltip
data.value: Run a Macro within a Excel workbook. The Workbook file needs to be enabled for Macros

data.name: activity_runslideshow
data.value: スライドショーを実行

data.name: activity_runslideshow_tooltip
data.value: Open a Microsoft Powerpoint Presentation and start slide show

data.name: activity_savemailitem
data.value: メールアイテムを保存

data.name: activity_savemailitem_tooltip
data.value: Save a Microsoft Outlook Mail item as a file

data.name: activity_setparagraph
data.value: パラグラフを設定

data.name: activity_setparagraph_filename
data.value: ファイル名

data.name: activity_setparagraph_filename_help
data.value: Full path and filename of Microsoft Word document to work with

data.name: activity_setparagraph_index
data.value: インデックス

data.name: activity_setparagraph_index_help
data.value: Overwrite content in the paragraph with this index, set 0 to overwrite the entire word document

data.name: activity_setparagraph_text
data.value: テキスト

data.name: activity_setparagraph_text_help
data.value: The text to set

data.name: activity_setparagraph_tooltip
data.value: Set content of a paragraph in side a Microsoft Word document

data.name: activity_writecell
data.value: セルを書込

data.name: activity_writecell_tooltip
data.value: Set a value or formular to a single cell in Microsoft Excel

data.name: activity_writerange
data.value: 範囲を書込

data.name: activity_writerange_cells
data.value: セル

data.name: activity_writerange_cells_help
data.value: Set the first cell to start writing from, leave blank to start at last empty row in column A

data.name: activity_writerange_datatable
data.value: DataTable

data.name: activity_writerange_datatable_help
data.value: The datatable containing the data to add to Excel

data.name: activity_writerange_tooltip
data.value: Write all data from a DataTable to at a range inside a Microsoft Excel sheet

data.name: activity_writerange_useheaderrow
data.value: ヘッダー行を使用

data.name: activity_writerange_useheaderrow_help
data.value: If set to true, will also add a header row with column names as the first row, set to false to only add the data
